You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &cup;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Cup;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22d3/index.htm U+022D3].
  * `&cup;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/222a/index.htm U+0222A].
